pmhal_vm.h File Reference
Voltage Configuration

This file contains the Voltage Manager API. This API supports OPP Voltage changes for all the voltage domains. More...

#include <ti/drv/pm/include/prcm/pmhal_prcm.h>

Detailed Description

This file contains the Voltage Manager API. This API supports OPP Voltage changes for all the voltage domains.
